definition: callus (patch or hardened skin)/corns (on feet)/also 老趼

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: For years, he prone paint and his hands full of callosity.
sentences.chinese: 長年俯地作畫，令他雙手佈滿老繭。

sentences.english: The long march had callused his feet.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾登握了握他那長滿老繭的手。

sentences.english: But the benefits will likelyoutweigh the callouses.
sentences.chinese: 但它的優點能蓋過這些老繭的。

sentences.english: He says a few calluses can help runners avoid injuries.
sentences.chinese: 他說，些許老繭可以幫助跑步者免受傷害。

sentences.english: Mcteague exhibited his hard, calloused palms .
sentences.chinese: 麥克梯格攤開那雙生滿老繭堅硬的手掌。

sentences.english: Today my old slan has become as dust.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我的老繭化爲塵埃。

sentences.english: Chan Kwok-Shing's index finger touched callosity said with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 陳國盛撫摸着食指上的老繭笑着說。

sentences.english: Today I shed my old skin which hath , too long , suffered the bruises of failure and wounds of mediocrity.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我爬出滿是失敗創傷和平庸劣跡的老繭。

sentences.english: His hands were rough and calloused, from years of karate practice.
sentences.chinese: 由於多年練習空手道，他的雙手粗糙不平，佈滿老繭。

sentences.english: For most people, eliminating the source of friction helps corns and calluses disappear.
sentences.chinese: 對大多數人來說，消除磨損源能讓雞眼和老繭消失。

sentences.english: The palms of your hands will thicken, the skin of your cheeks will tan.
sentences.chinese: 你手掌的老繭會越來越厚，你的雙頰會被曬得黝黑。

sentences.english: You should see the thick calluses on my feet.
sentences.chinese: 你們真該看看我腳上的那三個老繭。

sentences.english: Today, I crawl out the fully defeated wound callus.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我爬出滿是失敗創傷的老繭。

sentences.english: I showed my callused hands in court.
sentences.chinese: 我在法庭上展示我佈滿老繭手。

sentences.english: I saw the callous spot on your right forefinger where the handle of the pestle rubs.
sentences.chinese: 我看到你右手食指被乳鉢柄摩出老繭的地方了。

sentences.english: I go to school and just take grandma work-gnarled hands that go back to the kindergarten.
sentences.chinese: 我上學也只是牽着奶奶那雙佈滿老繭的手走回幼兒園。
